high_descs: Turn around to the dining table.
Pick up the apple from the dining table.
Turn left then turn around and go through the doorway, and go to the desk lamp.
Place the apple near the desk, and turn on the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a desk lamp and place the apple near the desk.

high_descs: Turn back and head to the dining table.
Pick up the apple in front of the microwave from the table.
Turn back and walk, come out of the room, then turn right, head to the desk lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the apple switch on the desk lamp.

high_descs: walk around and reach the diningtable
walk around and reach desklamp along with apple
anns.task_desc: pick up apple from diningtable and turn on the desklamp
